meta.title: Florencia Rímolo - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

hero.tagline: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and building applications that make a difference in people's lives.
about.description2: With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I specialize in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to innovative projects.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time inventory management and payment processing.

landing.title: Landing Page Template
landing.description: A responsive landing page template with modern design and smooth animations.

taskApp.title: Task Management App
taskApp.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.

weatherApi.title: Weather API
weatherApi.description: A RESTful weather API with caching and rate limiting features.

fitnessApp.title: Mobile Fitness App
fitnessApp.description: A cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts and nutrition.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio website with dark/light theme and multilingual support.

senior.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
senior.description: Leading development of enterprise web applications using modern technologies. Mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.description: Developed responsive web applications and improved user experience. Collaborated with design and backend teams.

junior.title: Junior Developer
junior.description: Built features for a SaaS platform and maintained existing codebase. Participated in code reviews and agile development.

freelance.title: Freelance Developer
freelance.description: Developed websites and web applications for various clients. Managed projects from conception to deployment.

computer.title: Computer Engineering
computer.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering with focus on software development and system architecture.

highSchool.description: Specialized in computer science and mathematics with honors.
